title: Wall Street Breakfast, April 6th: Jobs Report Takes Attention From Trade, Facebook

description: Today’s top stories: this morning’s job report is expected to grab the market’s attention; President Trump threatens tariff escalation; and Sheryl Sandberg talks up a paid Facebook product. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
